milk_tea.name: Hokkaido Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: A creamy and rich milk tea originating from Hokkaido, Japan. It has a smooth texture and a subtle sweetness that pairs well with the earthy notes of the tea.

milk_tea.name: Coffee Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: A unique blend of coffee and milk tea, offering a harmonious balance between the robust flavor of coffee and the mellow sweetness of milk tea.

milk_tea.name: Jasmine Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: Fragrant jasmine tea combined with creamy milk, creating a delightful beverage with floral undertones and a smooth finish.

milk_tea.name: Green Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: Green tea infused with milk, resulting in a refreshing drink with a hint of grassy notes from the green tea and the creaminess of milk.

milk_tea.name: Rose Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: Aromatic rose petals steeped in tea and mixed with milk, imparting a floral aroma and a delicate flavor profile.

milk_tea.name: Taro Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: Taro root blended with milk tea, offering a unique purple hue and a sweet, nutty flavor that distinguishes it from traditional milk teas.

milk_tea.name: Thai Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: A traditional Thai beverage made with strongly brewed Ceylon tea, sweetened condensed milk, and spices like star anise and cardamom, delivering a bold and flavorful experience.

milk_tea.name: Oreo Brulee Green Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: A decadent fusion of green milk tea with the rich, chocolatey flavor of Oreo cookies, topped with a caramelized brulee layer for added sweetness and texture.

milk_tea.name: Classic Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: The timeless combination of black tea and milk, offering a simple yet satisfying beverage with a balanced blend of tea and creaminess.

milk_tea.name: Thai Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: A variation of traditional Thai milk tea, possibly with a unique twist or additional flavorings to enhance the original recipe.

milk_tea.name: Matcha Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: Creamy milk tea infused with high-quality matcha powder, providing a vibrant green color and a distinctively earthy and slightly bitter taste characteristic of matcha.

milk_tea.name: Honeydew Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: Sweet and refreshing milk tea flavored with honeydew melon, offering a fruity and aromatic twist to the classic milk tea.

milk_tea.name: Tiramisu Milk Tea
milk_tea.description: Inspired by the classic Italian dessert, this milk tea features the flavors of coffee, cocoa, and mascarpone cheese, creating a rich and indulgent experience.

milk_tea.name: Mango Sunset
milk_tea.description: A tropical delight blending the sweetness of ripe mangoes with creamy milk tea, offering a refreshing and fruity twist.

milk_tea.name: Strawberry Matcha
milk_tea.description: A delightful fusion of vibrant strawberries and earthy matcha, creating a harmonious balance of fruity sweetness and herbal notes.
